title: [South Hallway]
description: Damp air coming from the stone slab walls leaves the hallway refreshingly cool.  Iron-work lanterns are bolted to the wall along the hall's length, fashioned in a geometric style and set with amber crystal panes.  They give off a golden glow which makes the stone seem more welcoming.

Damp air coming from the stone slab walls leaves the hallway refreshingly cool, a welcome relief from the hot tropical sun.  Iron-work lanterns are bolted to the wall along the hall's length, fashioned in a geometric style and set with amber crystal panes.  They give off a golden glow which makes the stone seem more welcoming.
paths: Obvious exits: north, southeast, south, southwest
